articles.title: Researchers Use Game of Thrones to Study Face Blindness - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Researchers used Game of Thrones to study how the brain recognizes faces, providing insights into prosopagnosia, a condition affecting facial recognition in 1 in 50 people.
